sentence: The only negative is that some of the rooms do n’t get much sun right outside so you ca n’t lay out right outside your room like you can at the pool bar location
Also there are floating loungers available for use at the pools
meant leaving your sliding doors walking across your deck down 5 stairs and across 5 feet of tile to reach the pool
They do have rafts for the pool which we used and loved
I have read the pool water is cold closer then your pool water in the Northeast
Firstly the area behind our bed where the jacuzi tub is located was in the process of being flooded
Most guests were not bathing in the ocean because the waves but if you looked down the beach maybe 300 feet there are reefs that block the waves and you can swim in relatively calm waters
Maid service and mini bar restocking was a little hit and miss at times but easily resolved with a call to front deskBeach and pool areas were always clean and well staffed
We had opted for 1st floor pool side “ swim up ” rooms as we had done on a previous visit
Even if you go to very shallow the safe guard will tell you to come back
We stayed in a ocean front terrace suite with a plunge pool and could not have been more happy with our choice
Several different pools around resort with several jacuzies
Lots of food to choose and pools were clean and nice
We set up every morning on the beach and went back and forth between ocean and pool
I am sorry I missed most of the names of the servers for the Excellence club beach and pool they always had a drink and a laugh for us

The resort is very nice because while out is sizable there is more than enough beach and pool area for everyone and you are never know than a minutes walk from the beach which is 30 seconds away from the pool
very clean and extremely friendly staff plenty of lounge chairs at pools and on the beach
Pool clean and maintained welCons
Two day sandstorm lots of beach sand blown onto walkways garden and into pools
The service was amazing The nightly entertainment was gegreOne low point was lack of music by the main pool during the day
